posts.title: Frans Hals Portraits
posts.body: An exhibition with work of 11 dutch impressionists and realists painters (20th century). These portraits were shown next to the paintings on the exhibition Labels. Jacobus van Looy, Coba Ritsema, Herman Kruyder.
posts.subtitle: Commissioned portraits for Frans Hals Museum Haarlem.

posts.title: About
posts.body:
Gemma Pauwels is a versatile illustrator specialized in editorial and conceptual illustrations for (online)
magazines and newspapers.

Please feel free to contact Gemma! gemmapauwels@gmail.com

Clients include: Newspaper Trouw, Frans Hals Museum, VluchtelingenWerk, Rabobank,
Publisher Essener, Amsterdam UMC, Theatermaker and more.
